setup: CREATE TABLE patient (id INT, name VARCHAR(100), gender VARCHAR(10), dob DATE, aadhar_no VARCHAR(12), address TEXT, district VARCHAR(50), state VARCHAR(50));
INSERT INTO patient VALUES (1, 'Rani Devi', 'Female', '1980-04-11', '123456789012', 'Gaya Bazaar, Bihar', 'Gaya', 'Bihar');
INSERT INTO patient VALUES (2, 'Rajat Kumar', 'Male', '1992-01-01', '234567890123', 'Main Road, Patna', 'Patna', 'Bihar');
INSERT INTO patient VALUES (3, 'Arvind Yadav', 'Male', '1985-03-23', '345678901234', 'Civil Lines, Gaya', 'Gaya', 'Bihar');
INSERT INTO patient VALUES (4, 'Priya Singh', 'Female', '1999-09-09', '456789012345', 'Kankarbagh, Patna', 'Patna', 'Bihar');

query: SELECT district, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient WHERE state = 'Bihar' GROUP BY district;
